name: politico
text:

name: politico
text: For Barr, the hearing will largely consist of parrying the torrent of attacks from Democrats who have been eager to upbraid him on national TV‚Äîand then catching his breath during what is likelier to be friendlier questions from the committee‚Äôs Republicans https://t.co/VTlUB3xeL9

text:
